categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lees Brannin was a female Human who served as a soldier in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, she was stationed at the Forward Bunker on the Icefall Plains of the planet Hoth, distributing stimulants and medical supplies to other Imperial forces.

Lees appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Stims Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth. The Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, released alongside the game, identified her as Lees Brannin.
